level.heading: VOLUNTARY TERMINATION OF ARBITRATION PROCEEDINGS (ยง 15-2616) If after the initiation of an arbitration proceeding, the arbitrating partieseach a negotiated agreement that resolves all of the issues submitted forrbitration, the arbitrating parties shall file a joint request to dismiss therbitration petition. The Commission may review and grant this request.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
